fr.upmc.colins.farm3.generator

Class RequestGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.upmc.colins.farm3.generator.RequestGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.ComponentI

    public class RequestGenerator
extends fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
    The class RequestGenerator implements a component that generates requests for a service provider in a discrete-event based simulation.

    Description

    A request has a processing time and an arrival process that both follow an exponential probability distribution. The generation process is started by executing the method generateNextRequest as a component task. It generates an instance of the class Request, with a processing time generated from its exponential distribution, and then schedule its next run after the interarrival time also generated from its exponential distribution. To stop the generation process, the method shutdown uses the future returned when scheduling the next request generation to cancel its execution.

    Invariant 

     invariant      rng != null && counter >= 0
 invariant      meanInterArrivalTime > 0.0 && meanProcessingTime > 0.0
 invariant      rgop != null && rgop instanceof RequestArrivalI

    Created on : 2 sept. 2014

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant, Colins-Alasca

        Contract 

         pre    meanInterArrivalTime > 0.0 && meanProcessingTime > 0.0
 pre    outboundPortURI != null
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        nrofApplications - number of applications to deploy
        meanInterArrivalTime - mean interarrival time of the requests in ms.
        meanNrofInstructions - mean number of instructions of the deployed apps.
        standardDeviation - standard deviation of the number of instructions
        requestOutboundPortPrefix - uri of the outbound ports to the dispatchers
        appRequestOutboundPortURI - uri of the outbound port to the admission control
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
